Yoosee is a free app designed for IP camera which is a new generation of smart home product.It uses advanced P2P network transmission technology,remote monitoring,video calling has never been easier,it is the best way to engage with family and friends.

勾选选框，则发件人与收件人为同一人
Will be learning remote controller emitting head close to the alignment of receiver transmitter head, and long press key 1 to 2S learning
Select you want to match in the following list of type
Select the device type you need below
Click the below button, and check whether your device has correct response, if the button is not switch button, please make sure your device is ON.
Click the below buttons, and check whether your device has correct response?
Click start learning button, please according to prompts to press a key on the remote corresponding

When the button on the remote control to turn gray, find the corresponding key, and press this button to learn, learn to complete, the system will automatically the next key learning, until all the key end.

When the key is grey, you have 20S time, find the corresponding button on the remote, and press this button for learning, learning is complete, the system will automatically the next key learning, until all the key end.
A new remote control is about to be born, hoping it will change your life, accompany you happy every day, please give your device has a name!

After tapping the button below, the device is in the state of acceptance, the equipment will be aligned in the hands of the original remote control, press the button on the remote control, the system will automatically find the most matching remote control
Long press the button into learning mode
Now the key is the key value, please click "edit" into learning mode specified key value
按键一旦学习,之前键值将被更新,并且不可回退,是否继续?Study button once, before the key value will be updated, and not back, whether to continue?
Now you can set your phone to the control of your TV, set-top boxes, projector, air conditioning and other electronic devices
在这里面请选择你想要打开那个房间场景按键,如果没有你想要打开场景按键,请选定添加场景按键.
请选择添加设备按键,要返回请按返回键.
关闭提示对话框后, 点击要学的按键, 进入学习状态
长按按键, 进入学习状态
长按电视台图标进入编辑状态
你可以触摸边框左右滑动,更多惊喜等待你的发掘.
长按按键将它移动到一个你喜欢的位置.移动到左右边缘可以将它丢弃.
感谢对我公司产品的关注,你是否有意向购买相应产品.
请先长按按键进行编辑.
当前电视台还没有绑定遥控器,是否去绑定
步骤(3)请点击下面遥控器的灰色按键观察电器是否都做出相应反应，如果是点击完成,如果不是请回到步骤(1)继续搜索，重复上述3步过程\n
当关闭提示对话框后将进入匹配模式, 请按页面提示操作.
(1)智能学习:学习手中现有电子设备的原始遥控器,学习成功后,作为替代原始遥控器使用.\n(2)智能匹配:从码库中匹配电子设备的原始遥控器,匹配成功后,作为替代原始遥控器使用.\n
第二步，如果设备做出正确反映，为了确保准确，请点击灰色按键进一步进行遥控，看设备是否做出反应，如果是，点击保存，如果不是，点击自动继续搜索。
